content.raw:
I'm trying to reproduce the problem. Does anyone have a more concrete example launch file and setup that I could test with?

There might be a buffering issue: https://github.com/ros/rosconsole/issues/5 and related question: https://answers.ros.org/question/200593/why-in-this-simple-sample-my-logs-are-not-written-in-logfile-or-is-there-a-way-to-control-the-flushing-period-of-the-log-files/
